description: City boots in polished leather, kiln-black color

core:description.text: Boots of polished leather in kiln-black, made for walking city streets and standing in formal halls. The leather has been worked to a high shine, catching light like dark water. They rise to mid-calf, lacing neatly up the front with black cord. The soles are thick but quiet, designed for paved surfaces and polished floors. These are not boots for mud or rough groundâ€”they are boots for someone whose work keeps them indoors, among people who notice such things. Maintained with evident care, showing the disciplined attention of their wearer.
